inclusion.criterion: patients requiring intra-operative placement of suprapubic catheters as part of routine post-operative care for repair of vaginal anterior compartment prolapse i.e. patients undergoing anterior colporrhaphy, Burch colposuspension, with or without mid-urethral sling
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known UTI at time of surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of chronic intermittent self-catheterization pre-operatively
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of antibiotics for any indication other than UTI during peri-operative and 6-week post-operative period
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of fistula involving urogenital tract
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of chronic steroids or immunosuppressant
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs, but is currently in urosepsis resolved after treatment. Has a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter and significant leaking around suprapubic cath site.
